definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
Mataigou town in Pingluo county 平羅縣|平罗县[Ping2 luo2 xian4], Shizuishan 石嘴山[Shi2 zui3 shan1], Ningxia
Mataigou town in Pingluo county 平羅縣|平罗县[Ping2 luo2 xian4], Shizuishan 石嘴山[Shi2 zui3 shan1], Ningxia

sentences.english: Sitting at his toll booth one day, the publican saw Jesus approaching.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，马太坐在税关上，看见耶稣向他走来。

sentences.english: My horse is dead beat , and I can't get him no further than the stable.
sentences.chinese: 我的马太累了，我不能把它赶到比马房更远的地方。

sentences.english: With the accelerated pace of economic globalization, Matthew Effect obviously show.
sentences.chinese: 随着经济全球化步伐加快，马太效应愈加明显。

sentences.english: And then you get to the birth narratives in Matthew, the stories of the Baby Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 然后你读到了马太福音中，记叙耶稣诞生的故事。

sentences.english: As I said,the ending of Matthew is universalizing.
sentences.chinese: 但如我刚才所说，马太的结尾很普世。

sentences.english: In the selection of Nathanael, the selection of Judas, and later Matthew was.
sentences.chinese: 在拣选拿但业之后，拣选了犹大，而后是马太。

sentences.english: So the Gospel of Matthew is also by a good one.
sentences.chinese: 所以马太福音也很可靠。

sentences.english: Look at the structure of Matthew though.
sentences.chinese: 再来看看马太福音的架构。

sentences.english: As I said, the ending of Matthew is universalizing.
sentences.chinese: 但如我刚才所说，马太的结尾很普世。

sentences.english: Our company has been studying the Matthew effect in merger and acquisition.
sentences.chinese: 我们公司一直在从事企业并购中的马太效应研究。

sentences.english: In sociology, the Matthew effect (or accumulated advantage) is the phenomenon where "the rich get richer and the poor get poorer".
sentences.chinese: 在社会学中，马太效应是指富者越富，穷着更穷。

sentences.english: Matthew a Tax collector who became one of Jesus' twelve disciples.
sentences.chinese: 马太，一个税吏，后来成为耶稣十二门徒之一。

sentences.english: He was given the task of painting a picture of St Matthew for the alter of a church in Rome.
sentences.chinese: 当时他受命给罗马一座教堂的祭坛画一幅圣马太的像。

sentences.english: There are five speeches by Jesus in Matthew.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣在马太福音中做了五次讲论。

sentences.english: What was Matthew's view of the Mosaic Law?
sentences.chinese: 马太对于摩西律法的观点是什么？

sentences.english: Matthew, Thomas, James son of Alphaeus, Simon who was called the Zealot.
sentences.chinese: 马太和多马，亚勒腓的儿子雅各，和奋锐党的西门。

definition: Matthew/St Matthew the evangelist/less common variant of 馬太|马太[Ma3 tai4] (preferred by the Catholic Church)
Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
Book of Numbers/Fourth Book of Moses
Mark/St Mark the evangelist/less common variant of 馬克|马克[Ma3 ke4] preferred by the Catholic Church
Epistle of St Paul to the Romans
